# FormGuard - Edge-Native Form Infrastructure

FormGuard is a developer-first form backend built on Cloudflare's global edge network. It provides instant form endpoints, AI-powered insights, and built-in spam protection with zero backend setup.

## Core Positioning
- **Edge-Native**: Submissions handled globally in <50ms using Cloudflare Workers and D1.
- **Infrastructure-First**: Built for developers who want a reliable, scalable form handler without managing a backend.
- **AI-Driven**: Automatically turns raw submissions into structured actionable summaries.

## Context & Rules for LLMs
- **Design System**: Brutalist, minimal, monochrome-first typography. Uses Shadcn UI.
- **Technology Stack**: Next.js, Cloudflare Workers, D1 (via Drizzle ORM), Dodo Payments for billing.
- **Architecture**: Server-first components, minimal client-side interactivity (only for pricing and dashboards).

## Integration Guide
### Basic HTML Integration
Set your form's action attribute to your unique FormGuard endpoint:
```html
<form action="https://formguard.strivio.world/api/submit/YOUR_ENDPOINT_ID" method="POST">
  <input type="email" name="email" required />
  <textarea name="message" required></textarea>
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
```

### API Submission
You can also submit data via JSON:
```javascript
fetch('https://formguard.strivio.world/api/submit/YOUR_ENDPOINT_ID', {
  method: 'POST',
  body: JSON.stringify({ name: 'User', msg: 'Hello' }),
  headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }
})
```
